38 
39 import rospy
40 from std_msgs.msg import String
41 
42 pub = None
43 # publish a message to subscribers when we die
44 def talker_shutdown():
45  print("I'm dead!")
46  pub.publish("I'm dead!")
47 
48 def talker():
49  global pub
50  pub = rospy.Publisher('chatter', String, queue_size=10)
51  rospy.init_node('talker', anonymous=True)
52 
53  # register talker_shutdown() to be called when rospy exits
54  rospy.on_shutdown(talker_shutdown)
55  print("Hit ctrl-C to see on_shutdown example")
56 
57  # spin() blocks until the node shuts down
58  rospy.spin()
59 
60 if __name__ == '__main__':
61  talker()
